name: Hunt (Snownebula)
description:
Adventure as a wolf. More updates to come.

Version 5 adds weather. If you want weather you need to get a weather underground API witch can be found here: https://www.wunderground.com/weather/api You can still play WITHOUT the API, but the day and weather will be set to 12 pm and you will NOT have weather, with the API you will have real time and real weather.
